description:
It’s party time at the PAW Patrol Grand Prix, so rev up and race to collect the most pup treats – or grab them from other players – before the time runs out! With three battle arenas , amazing power-ups like Everest’s Snowballs, and local multiplayer for up to four pups, this new downloadable content is PAWsome fun!

PAWSOME POWER-UPS – Use any skill, like Everest’s Snowballs, Tracker's Grabber Arm, and Ryder's Invincibility Shield, to outdo other players.

EXCITING ARENAS – Battle in Adventure Bay, the Jungle, and Jake’s Snowboarding Resort.

ANY PUP CAN WIN – Use your speed and power-ups or grab the Golden Pup Treat to win.

SOLO AND MULTIPLAYER FUN – Enjoy local 4-player battles or take on AI-powered pup pals!
name: PAW Patrol Grand Prix - Pup Treat Arena
